oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Paul Jenkins and Danny Myrick - 2017-02-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singers \ songwriters Paul Jenkins and Danny Myrick from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 27, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Paul Jenkins; Danny Myrick;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00)Walk-in Music / (04:25) Opening comments from Abi Tapia and introduction of Paul Jenkins and Danny Myrick / (07:40) Opening comments from songwriters / (10:04) Truck Yeah (Danny Myrick) / (14:32) Over (Paul Jenkins) / (20:49) I Love This Life (Danny Myrick) / (25:04) Who I Am With You (Paul Jenkins) / (29:00) Answers question about guitar playing / (31:53) I Sing About You (Danny Myrick) / (36:02) Sunny and 75 (Paul Jenkins) / (40:30) Question about artists' changing what they've written / (42:38) Question about royalties and licensing / (43:54) Question about current laws regarding pay for songwriting / (44:48) Question about use of songs in commercials / (46:16) She's Country (Danny Myrick) / (51:21) Don't You Wanna Stay (Paul Jenkins) / (55:31) Closing Comments / (56:03) TAPE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jenkins, Paul; Myrick, Danny; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
